info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 8 at 4:47PM MDT until July 8 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of south central New Mexico, including the following county, Dona Ana.
* WHEN...Until 745 PM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 446 PM MDT, emergency management reported heavy rain in the warned area due to thunderstorms. Flooding is ongoing. Up to 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Organ, East Mesa and Northeast Las Cruces. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Arroyos, streams, and rivers can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING
